DOC.brief_summary: This study is requested by PMDA to confirm the optimal dose for THR (total hip replacement).
DOC.brief_title: Total Hip Replacement Study Of GSK576428 (Fondaparinux Sodium)
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing either an elective primary THR (total hip replacement) surgery or a revision of a THR. Active, clinically significant bleeding (excluding drainage).
